thread.title: 「トップレスで日光浴する権利を」 半裸の女性らがデモ
thread.title_full: 「トップレスで日光浴する権利を」 半裸の女性らがデモ

author: 中野渉
title: 「トップレスで日光浴する権利を」 半裸の女性らがデモ
text:   A woman poses topless with the words "I am free" written on her back during a protest in response to a recent incident on an Argentine resort beach between police and topless sunbathers, in downtown Buenos Aires, Argentina, February 7, 2017. REUTERS/Marcos Brindicci Women take part in a topless demo at the Republic square in Buenos Aires on February 7, 2017. Hundreds of Argentinian women demonstrated topless by the Obelisk of Buenos Aires after topless was prohibitted at a seaside resort south of the capital. / AFP / JUAN MABROMATA (Photo credit should read JUAN MABROMATA/AFP/Getty Images) A woman holds a sign reading 'Boobs that bother are those which are not for sale' during a topless demo at the Republic square in Buenos Aires on February 7, 2017. Hundreds of Argentinian women demonstrated topless by the Obelisk of Buenos Aires after topless was prohibitted at a seaside resort south of the capital. / AFP / JUAN MABROMATA (Photo credit should read JUAN MABROMATA/AFP/Getty Images) Topless women attend a protest in response to a recent incident on an Argentine resort beach between police and topless sunbathers, in downtown Buenos Aires, Argentina, February 7, 2017. REUTERS/Marcos Brindicci TEMPLATE OUT A woman poses topless with the words "censor this" written on her body during a protest in response to a recent incident on an Argentine resort beach between police and topless sunbathers, in downtown Buenos Aires, Argentina, February 7, 2017. REUTERS/Marcos Brindicci TEMPLATE OUT A woman poses topless during a protest in response to a recent incident on an Argentine resort beach between police and topless sunbathers, in downtown Buenos Aires, Argentina, February 7, 2017. REUTERS/Marcos Brindicci TEMPLATE OUT A woman poses topless with the words "The tit is not a crime" written on her back during a protest in response to a recent incident on an Argentine resort beach between police and topless sunbathers, in downtown Buenos Aires, Argentina, February 7, 2017. REUTERS/Marcos Brindicci TEMPLATE OUT A woman poses topless with the words "I am free" written on her back during a protest in response to a recent incident on an Argentine resort beach between police and topless sunbathers, in downtown Buenos Aires, Argentina, February 7, 2017. REUTERS/Marcos Brindicci A man poses for a photo next to a topless woman during a protest in response to a recent incident on an Argentine resort beach between police and topless sunbathers, in downtown Buenos Aires, Argentina, February 7, 2017. REUTERS/Marcos Brindicci TEMPLATE OUT BUENOS AIRES, ARGENTINA - FEBRUARY 07: (EDITORS NOTE: Image contains nudity) A woman poses during 'Tetazo' (topless) feminist demonstration at the Obelisco on February 07, 2017 in Buenos Aires, Argentina. This countrywide protest was organized after police officers were called in to force three women sunbathing topless on a beach in Necochea (500 kms away from Buenos Aires) to cover up their breasts and leave the beach. (Photo by Gabriel Rossi/LatinContent/Getty Images) A woman gets her nipples painted during a topless demo at the Republic square in Buenos Aires on February 7, 2017. Hundreds of Argentinian women demonstrated topless by the Obelisk of Buenos Aires after topless was prohibitted at a seaside resort south of the capital. / AFP / JUAN MABROMATA (Photo credit should read JUAN MABROMATA/AFP/Getty Images) BUENOS AIRES, ARGENTINA - FEBRUARY 07: (EDITORS NOTE: Image contains nudity) A woman speaks during 'Tetazo' (topless) feminist demonstration at the Obelisco on February 07, 2017 in Buenos Aires, Argentina. This countrywide protest was organized after police officers were called in to force three women sunbathing topless on a beach in Necochea (500 kms away from Buenos Aires) to cover up their breasts and leave the beach. (Photo by Gabriel Rossi/LatinContent/Getty Images) A woman is pictured during a topless demo at the Republic square in Buenos Aires on February 7, 2017. Hundreds of Argentinian women demonstrated topless by the Obelisk of Buenos Aires after topless was prohibitted at a seaside resort south of the capital. / AFP / JUAN MABROMATA (Photo credit should read JUAN MABROMATA/AFP/Getty Images) A woman takes her shirt off during a topless demo at the Republic square in Buenos Aires on February 7, 2017. Hundreds of Argentinian women demonstrated topless by the Obelisk of Buenos Aires after topless was prohibitted at a seaside resort south of the capital. / AFP / JUAN MABROMATA (Photo credit should read JUAN MABROMATA/AFP/Getty Images) A woman gets her nipples painted during a topless demo at the Republic square in Buenos Aires on February 7, 2017. Hundreds of Argentinian women demonstrated topless by the Obelisk of Buenos Aires after topless was prohibitted at a seaside resort south of the capital. / AFP / JUAN MABROMATA (Photo credit should read JUAN MABROMATA/AFP/Getty Images) BUENOS AIRES, ARGENTINA - FEBRUARY 07: A woman assaults a man during 'Tetazo' (topless) feminist demonstration at the Obelisco on February 07, 2017 in Buenos Aires, Argentina. This countrywide protest was organized after police officers were called in to force three women sunbathing topless on a beach in Necochea (500 kms away from Buenos Aires) to cover up their breasts and leave the beach. (Photo by Gabriel Rossi/LatinContent/Getty Images) Topless women attend a protest in response to a recent incident on an Argentine resort beach between police and topless sunbathers, in downtown Buenos Aires, Argentina, February 7, 2017. REUTERS/Marcos Brindicci  シェア
